name: Chickpea Cauliflower Rice Biryani with Tomato Raita
description: Chickpea Cauliflower Rice Biryani. 1 pot 30 Minute Meal with Veggies, Chickpeas, Spices, and Cauliflower Rice. Served with vegan tomato raita. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Grain-free Recipe. Easily made oil-free
recipeIngredient: a good dash of black pepper
1 cup cooked chickpeas ( or use other beans or lentils)
1 cup chopped veggies (combination of peppers, carrots, zucchini, green beans)
2 tbsp plain nondairy yogurt  (or use full fat coconut milk or thin cashew cream)
2.5  cups cauliflower rice (3 to 3.5 cups of florets will produce 2.5 + cups rice)
1.5 tsp lime juice and more for garnish
2 tbsp chopped cashews (dry toasted or toasted in a bit of oil until golden)
2 tbsp chopped cilantro & 2 tbsp chopped mint (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. When hot, add cumin seeds, bay leaves and cloves and cook for a minute or until fragrant. Add sliced onion and a pinch of salt and cook for 4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. When hot, add cumin seeds, bay leaves and cloves and cook for a minute or until fragrant. Add sliced onion and a pinch of salt and cook for 4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add garlic and ginger and cook for another 3 to 4 minutes or until onion is golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add garlic and ginger and cook for another 3 to 4 minutes or until onion is golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the ground spices and mix in. cook for half a minute. Add chickpeas, 1/4 tsp salt, garlic powder, veggies and mix in. Partially cover and cook for 5 to 7 minutes or until the veggies are al dente.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the ground spices and mix in. cook for half a minute. Add chickpeas, 1/4 tsp salt, garlic powder, veggies and mix in. Partially cover and cook for 5 to 7 minutes or until the veggies are al dente.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in peas and yogurt and mix in. Cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in peas and yogurt and mix in. Cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the riced cauliflower, 1/2 tsp salt, lime juice and toss well combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the riced cauliflower, 1/2 tsp salt, lime juice and toss well combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook for 7 to 8 minutes. Uncover, add half of the toasted nuts and currants and gently fluff the cauliflower. Taste and adjust salt and spice.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook for 7 to 8 minutes. Uncover, add half of the toasted nuts and currants and gently fluff the cauliflower. Taste and adjust salt and spice.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the bay leaf. Garnish with the remaining toasted nuts, cilantro and/or mint, lime and serve with raita.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the bay leaf. Garnish with the remaining toasted nuts, cilantro and/or mint, lime and serve with raita.

itemListElement.text: Combine 3/4 cup of unsweetened plain non dairy yogurt and 2 tbsp water in a bowl. Whisk to make a smooth mixture. Add 1/4 cup chopped tomato (chopped small), 2 tbsp chopped cilantro, 1/4 tsp ground cumin, a good dash of salt and cayenne and mix in. Taste adjust salt if needed. Garnish with 1 tbsp chopped tomatoes, a dash of cumin and cayenne.
